name: Free Candy (SleepyJack01)
description:
The things I do for a midnight snack.

Survive the underground labyrinth and claim the free candy.

Typical first-person controls: "WASD" to move, MOUSE to look around, and SHIFT to sprint.

This game was created for My First Game Jam: Summer 2021 and is the first game I've made independently.

Any and all feedback is welcome and appreciated!
